;;; TOOL: run-gen-wasm-bad
;;; ARGS1: --enable-bulk-memory
;;; ARGS2: --enable-bulk-memory
magic
version
section(MEMORY) {
  count[1]
  has_max[0]
  initial[1]
}
section(DATACOUNT) {
  count[2]
}
section(DATA) {
  count[1]
  memory_index[0]
  offset[i32.const 0 end]
  data[str("whoops")]
}
(;; STDERR ;;;
0000013: error: data segment count does not equal count in DataCount section
0000013: error: data segment count does not equal count in DataCount section
;;; STDERR ;;)
